title: Channon Christian and Christoper Newsom ////// 258
description:
Channon Christian and Chris Newsom ////// 258

Part 1 of 1

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

A beautiful young lady with a successful full life ahead of her. A young man who worked hard and loved his girl. When a young couple goes out to dinner and a movie at a friends house what could possibly go so wrong? Unfortunately this is a story about when pure evil randomly crossed paths with innocence. This week we explore another highly requested case, the torture murders of Channon Christian and Chris Newsome. Beer of the Week - Chamhopnay by Last Days of Autumn Brewing Company Garage Grade - 4 out of 5 bottle caps
